data.name: Nightborne
data.description:
Nightborne

Units:
15% spell damage reduction
-5% attack rate
-5% hit points
+10% buy cooldown
No mana regeneration

Buildings:
+12.5% mana

Upgrades:
+1Lv Magic

Traits: Very proficient in magic and arcane arts. All units have mana and can cast spells. However, they do not regenerate mana and need to steal it from the enemy. No Air unit or Artillery.

Difficulty: Expert

auras.name: Brilliance Aura
auras.description:
+0.1 MP/s to units and buildings
(4500 range)

(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.description:

(does not affect Special unit)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Source of Magic [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Mana Drain

Icreases Arcan'dor Spire and Arcanist mana by 10%. Unlocks upgrades for them inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Arcan'dor Spire spells by 30%.

Type: Base Defence / Magic Power

bonuses.name: Arcane Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Arcane Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:

You get +50% gold for Hero kills.

spells.description:

towerUpgrades.name: Haste
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to increase speed
Affects: Overseer and Archer
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +15% speed for 12 sec
Lv2: +30% speed for 10 sec
Lv3: +45% speed for 8 sec
Lv4: +60% speed for 6 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Slowdown
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to reduce speed
Affects: Overseer
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: -15% speed for 12 sec
Lv2: -30% speed for 10 sec
Lv3: -45% speed for 8 sec
Lv4: -60% speed for 6 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Spellfire Arrows
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus splash damage
Affects: Archer
(affects organic units only)
(5 sec cooldown, costs 9 mana)

Lv1: +20 damage in 175 AoE
Lv2: +40 damage in 175 AoE
Lv3: +60 damage in 175 AoE
Lv4: +80 damage in 175 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Backtrack
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to heal when damaged
Affects: Overseer, Archer and Arcanist

Lv1: 14% to heal 30 HP
Lv2: 14% to heal 60 HP
Lv3: 14% to heal 90 HP
Lv4: 14% to heal 120 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Silence
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to silence
Affects: Spellslinger
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

Lv1: silences for 20 sec in 175 AoE
Lv2: silences for 25 sec in 200 AoE
Lv3: silences for 30 sec in 225 AoE
Lv4: silences for 35 sec in 250 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Mana Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: blocks damage with mana
Affects: Manasabre Rider and Spellslinger

Lv1: 0.6 damage per mana point
Lv2: 0.9 damage per mana point
Lv3: 1.2 damage per mana point
Lv4: 1.5 damage per mana point

towerUpgrades.name: Multishot
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: multishot for speed penalty
Affects: Spellslinger

Lv1: 3 targets, -30% attack rate
Lv2: 3 targets, -20% attack rate
Lv3: 3 targets, -10% attack rate
Lv4: 3 targets, no penalty

towerUpgrades.name: Arcane Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: near invulnerability
Affects: Custodian

Lv1: lasts 5 sec
Lv2: lasts 6 sec
Lv3: lasts 7 sec
Lv4: lasts 8 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Mana Drain
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to steal mana
Affects: All non-Hero units
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: drains 30 mana
Lv2: drains 60 mana
Lv3: drains 90 mana
Lv4: drains 120 mana

t1spell.description:

heroes.name: Spellblade
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Frost Pulse (Disable Spell)
8-14 sec stun in a radius
(350-500 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Absorb Mana (Disable Spell)
drains 60-120 mana
(affects organic Heroes only)

Fire Pulse (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage in an area
(200-250 area of effect)

Mana Shield (Self Spell)
absorbs 20-26 HP per 1 MP

heroes.name: First Arcanist
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Nuker

Can learn:
Unstable Field (Damage Spell)
25 damage/sec for 10-16 sec
(275 area of effect)

Absorb Mana (Disable Spell)
drains 60-120 mana
(affects organic Heroes only)

Time Lock (Disable Spell)
stuns 1 unit for 7-10 sec
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Leyline Rip (Damage Spell)
300-600 damage in a line
(1500 wave distance)

skills.description: Burns nearby enemy units for 20 points of damage per second.

heroes.name: Chief Telemancer
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Disabler

Can learn:
Chronosphere (Disable Spell)
8-14 sec stun in 300 AoE
(affects non-Hero units only)

Absorb Mana (Disable Spell)
drains 60-120 mana
(affects organic Heroes only)

Null Field (Disable Spell)
silences for 20-32 sec
(doesn't affect Special unit)
(also affects buildings)

Unstable Portal (Summoning Spell)
summons Portal for 30-90 sec
